title: Large 3 Beds plus - minutes to DT close to everything
posting_body: ['This large upper Unit is newly remodeled, new flooring, kitchen cabinets, and freshly painted, near a bus stop, and is minutes to DT.', 'Rent is $ 1600.00; included in the rent is heat, water & trash.', 'Available Now.', 'For showing please text', 'show contact info', 'or email full names and date of birth of all adults planing to live in the unit for pre-screening', 'Application Fee: $35 per adult', 'The $35 application fee per adult will be used to conduct a background check that encompasses the following four areas:', '(1) Credit', '(2) Criminal history', '(3) Employment/Wage verification', '(4) Prior rental history', 'Requirements:', 'Clean criminal record.', 'Good standing rental history, no evictions and/or unlawful detainers in the past 3 years.', 'Verifiable monthly income, 2.5 times the rent amount.', 'In order to secure the rental property the approved applicant is required to place a deposit.', "The security deposit is the equivalent of one month's rent or the amount requested that reflects your credit application.", 'Some prospective tenants may need to make at least 2.5 times the monthly rent to qualify for the rental units']
